text: aur ye haqeeqee baat hai ki hamane moosa ko kitaab (tauret) dee aur unake baad bahut se paigambaron ko unake qadam ba qadam le chalen aur mariyam ke bete eesa ko (bhee bahut se) vaajee va raushan maujije die aur paak rooh jibareel ke zariye se unakee madad kee kya tum us qadar badadimaag ho gae ho ki jab koee paigambar tumhaare paas tumhaaree khvaahishe nafasaanee ke khilaaph koee hukm lekar aaya to tum akad baithe phir tumane baaz paigambaron ko to jhuthalaaya aur baaz ko jaan se maar daala
